name: Pixie’s Umbrella
description: The Pixie’s Umbrella resembles an ordinary fungus when motionless, featuring a small cap and low durability.
memorable: It can blend into its surroundings and release toxic spores to incapacitate creatures.
goals: To evade detection and protect itself from threats.
relations: May be found in environments with other fungi or plants.
environment: Typically located in damp, shaded areas like forests or swamps.
strengths: Its False Appearance allows it to remain undetected until it attacks.
weaknesses: Very low hit points and armor class make it vulnerable to direct attacks.
attacks: Releases toxic spores in a 5-foot radius, dealing poison damage to nearby creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Twirl ability releases spores that can poison creatures and inflict damage.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 ft., allowing it to sense nearby creatures even in the dark.
additional_information: Immune to blindness, deafness, and being frightened.
Can float away from danger as a reaction.
Very low strength, intelligence, and charisma scores.
test_queries: plant that looks like a fungus
poisonous plant creature in the forest
small creature that releases toxic spores
stealthy plant that can fly away
peculiar plant with poison damage ability
